replies.body: this cho rework is sorta good
i main {{champion:31}}  and i disapprove of this update {{item:3151}}

Ok, First off, thank you Riot for giving some love to a outdated champion. even a minor update that gives him some new play styles and ways to play, honestly good job.

But there's another champ, very old, very frail, and this season, Singed needs some real treatment. As an AP Bruiser, hes needs the same treatment as Cho, or honestly, a bit more. his play style has been pushed around so much from item changes. zzrot, Rylies, liandries, courage, HOLY HELL GHOST NURF! All of these important items nurfed because they were to strong on other champs... so riot, please, dont force singed players to play him like a tank, no one likes that. 

Make Singed Great Again
{{champion:27}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:27}}
Wow, who knew Cho would be the next update, even if it's not a major one.

this update makes me wanna play cho again, when people say fiora is like playing another game, (which is a big lie), cho will be like playing another game, albiet how small, but making his kit that much more unique, but from what ive learnt, unique champs are either very op or underplayed (ivern ring any bells)
